member.name: P:Geofence.Plugin.Abstractions.GeofenceCircularRegion.ShowNotification
member.summary: Enables showing local notifications. Defaults to showing all notifications, unless setting ShowEntry/Exit/StayNotification entries to false. Messages could be configured using properties: NotificationEntryMessage, NotificationExitMessage, NotificationStayMessage

member.name: P:Geofence.Plugin.Abstractions.GeofenceCircularRegion.ShowEntryNotification
member.summary: Enables showing local notifications. ShowNotification must be true. Messages could be configured using properties: NotificationEntryMessage

member.name: P:Geofence.Plugin.Abstractions.GeofenceCircularRegion.ShowExitNotification
member.summary: Enables showing local notifications. ShowNotification must be true. Messages could be configured using properties: NotificationExitMessage

member.name: P:Geofence.Plugin.Abstractions.GeofenceCircularRegion.ShowStayNotification
member.summary: Enables showing local notifications. ShowNotification must be true. Messages could be configured using properties: NotificationStayMessage
